summary: Makes Requiem and Undeath Fully Compatible.
descriptionHtml:
Makes Requiem and Undeath Fully Compatible by giving the NecroLichRace of Undeath Requiem perks similar to those the Dragonpriest have and adjusting the stats of both NPC enemies and the player Lich form alike and Increasing the Survivability of the Lich form by giving it elements of Requiem's Style.

Load Order should be as Followed:
- Requiem
- Other Requiem Patches
- Undeath
- Requiem and Undeath Patch

Be sure to check out my other Patch for Vampiric Thirst and Royal Bloodline:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55899/?
author: Tx12001
